NFFT_CTRL

Absolute Address:
Base Offset:
0x0
Size:
0x2
Source:
registers.rdl

Contents

Bits Identifier Access Reset Decoded Name
[15] DWA_EN rw 0x0 -
[14:0] NFFT_POWER rw 0x0 -

Field Descriptions

DWA_EN

If 1, enables DWA during FFT conversion. Else, there will be no DEM whatsoever.

NFFT_POWER

FFT power (8 LSB bits). When taking FFT samples, the ADC will take 2^NFFT_POWER samples.
